item.title: Modeling Water Quality in a Suburban Watershed
item.description: Tested two spatial statisics approaches to predict in-stream water quality.

item.title: Phosphorus Cycling in Stream Biofilms
item.description: Lab study measuring the impact of alternating anaerobic/aerobic conditions on stream biofilms.

item.title: Climate Risk Assessment in Western North Carolina
item.description: Integrating hydrology model outputs and demographics data to aid risk assessment and climate change adaptation efforts in North Carolina.

item.title: Ecohydrological Modeling with Stable Isotopes
item.description: Created an ecohydrology stable isotope model to test the two-water-world hypothesis.

item.title: Hydrologic Characterization Tool (HCT)
item.description: Developing a web-based application to evaluate agricultural best management practices.
